verbs.description: [ARG0: Stephen Colbert] [V: took] on [ARG1: Donald Trump] [ARGM-TMP: once again] [ARGM-TMP: during Thursday 's episode of The Late Show with Stephen Colbert] . He addressed the President 's wild rant on Fox & Friends that morning and more .

Stephen Colbert took on Donald Trump once again during Thursday 's episode of The Late Show with Stephen Colbert . [ARG0: He] [V: addressed] [ARG1: the President 's wild rant on Fox & Friends] [ARGM-TMP: that morning] and more .
